scripts.build: prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build
scripts.start: node scripts/check-build.js && node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const port = process.env.PORT || '3000'; console.log('NODE', process.version); console.log('PORT', port); const r = spawnSync(process.platform==='win32'?'npx.cmd':'npx', ['next','start','-H','0.0.0.0','-p', String(port)], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(r.status ?? 1);"
